snippet: There is a furtive surprise in Kesha’s second full-length album, “Warrior,” and the saxophonist Jon Irabagon releases two proudly intemperate albums.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews Warrior, second full-length album by singer-songwriter and rapper Kesha; Nate Chinen reviews two recordings by jazz saxophonist Jon Irabagon.

byline.original: By BEN RATLIFF and NATE CHINEN

lead_paragraph: There is a furtive surprise in Kesha’s second full-length album, “Warrior,” and the saxophonist Jon Irabagon releases two proudly intemperate albums.

headline.seo: New Albums From Kesha and Jon Irabagon
headline.main: Flip Side to Her Wild Side
headline.print_headline: Flip Side To Her Wild Side
